values.description: Base URL for the API. Change to your server URL (e.g., http://localhost:5000 or https://api.example.com)
JWT authentication token. Set this after logging in via the Auth collection. Do NOT commit real tokens to version control.
Product ID for testing. Get this from the Products collection responses.
Cart item ID for testing. Get this from the Cart collection responses.
Order ID for testing. Get this from the Orders collection responses.
User email address for email service testing. Use a test email address.
